attributes.action: Call upon the Charity Commissioners to revoke the charitable status enjoyed by pseudo-religious cults such as the Church of Scientology
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scientology is not a religion, it is a money-making corporation that exploits vulnerable people, extorts money from its followers and harrasses those who seek to oppose it.
Although the Government cannot ban Religions, this organization hides behind the facade of religion to avoid paying tax.

rejection.details:
To comply with defamation laws, we cannot publish your petition as currently worded. You may wish to re-word your petition or to sign one of these petitions on a similar topic:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/TaxReligions/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/nochurchtaxfree/
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
